description:
The fun & enjoyable lateral thinking game, that makes you think about everything outside the box- testing your brain skills and your general knowledge.

Bored at work or school?

Like a challenge?

Want to keep your brain active?

This app gives you lateral thinking puzzles and games, which no other app does. How did that man survive a fall from a sky scraper? How can you go down a one way street, the wrong way, and not break the law? Find out the answers to both of these and many others in the app.

We update the app often and are adding new additions all the time, and during January 2011 we plan to over triple the amount currently in the app!

. Easy to use interface

. Choose your level, Intermediate, Hard or Extreme

. Even ADD YOUR OWN!

. Comes from the same company as the very popular apps Flashlight. (Lite & Pro) & FlickrSearch 

Work them out yourself then see if your friends & family can work out these fun mind games!

The app is compatible with both Pre & Pixi devices and is WebOS 2.0 compatible
